project_abstract.cdata: THe Kilombero Sugar Project comprises: the construction of an additional sugar factory and development of an associated estate and outgrowers development capable of producing 45,000 metric tons per annum; associated facilities including staff housing, water supply and community facilities and technical services and training; and a sugar development survey.
